FranticFling

Frantic fling is a mobile game I made as a prove of concept. The set of goals I had for this game is that it needed to be:
A) endless (that is, in theory).
B) not relying on graphics, so it only should consist of simple shapes.
C) have ads, even if you hate them, I still wanted to make use of them.

The end result, after some brainstorming, is Frantic fling. It is a game where you can fling the ball up the level, while avoiding obstacles. While your flinging the ball up, rising lava is always catching up to you, so you have to outrun it. Meanwhile you'll also find green orb's, picking these up can allow you to get new skin colors in the shop.

Link to download the game
